column4: Ubutu are doing a good job of spreading our OS but its still not 100% for noobs yet but then again neither is win...
Why would you want to make Linux for 'n00bs'? The fun of using Linux is learning all the little bits and peices that make you a compitent sysadmin.
I agree 100% with that but I would like to see M$ have a down fall. Then again since Linux has progressed micro shit have took the step up on open source.
